name: da-PnPPowerShell-assistant
title: PnP PowerShell Assistant Agent
shortDescription: This declarative agent, named PnP PowerShell Assistant helps users creating PnP PowerShell cmdlets
longDescription: This declarative agent, named PnP PowerShell Assistant helps users creating PnP PowerShell cmdlets to perform specific actions. The agent is design to provide a PowerShell cmdlet that you can easily copy and paste to your PowerShell console.

thumbnails.alt: Declarative agent for PnP PowerShell Assistant

references.name: Microsoft 365 Copilot extensibility
references.description: Learn more about what Microsoft 365 Copilot and how you can extend it.
